title: Ini Achcham Achcham Illai Song Lyrics Indira
stanzas:
Ini Achcham Achcham Illai Song Lyrics Indira
#ARRahman #SujathaMohan #AnuradhaSriram

Vidiyaatha iravu endru
edhuvum illai
mudiyaatha thuyar endru
edhuvum illai

vadiyaatha vellam endru
edhuvum illai
vaazhatha vazhkai endru
edhuvum illai

ye achcham achcham illai
ini adimai ennam illai
nam kaalam ingae
koodipochu
kanneer micham illaiye.(2)

kaalam maaripochu
nam kanneer maaripochu
naalai nalla naalai
endra nambikkai undaachu

ye achcham achcham illai
ini adimai ennam illai
nam kaalam ingae
koodipochu
kanneer micham illaiye.

andha nila nila nila
ne odivaaa

pattaampoochi sutrum
manithan enna mattam
ada innum konjam
ponaal enna vaanam
thalaiyil thattum (2)

vaadi ilaiya chelliye
vaadi ilaiya chelliye
nam kaalam sollum
nammai vazha solliye

amma azhagu kannammaa
amma azhagu kannammaa
idhu namm boomi endru
azhuthi sollammaa

ye achcham achcham illai
ini adimai ennam illai
nam kaalam ingae
koodipochu
kanneer micham illaiye.(2)

kaalam maaripochu
nam kanneer maaripochu
naalai nalla naalai
endra nambikkai undaachu (2)

hey vaanam pakkam ini
vazhkai romba pakkam
achcham achcham thutcham
endral pakkam pakkam
sorgam.

boomi thularndhu kedakku
ada manusa payan manasu
pootti kidakku

ini achcham achcham illai
ini adimai ennam illai
ini achcham achcham illai
ini adimai ennam illai
nam kaalam ingae
koodipochu
kanneer micham illaiye.

inbak kaatru veesattum
ettu thikkum paravattam
paravattum paravattum

manitha pookkal malarattum
marangal innum viriyattum
viriyattum viriyattum (2)

kuttram kutram eriyattum
sutram sutram vazhattum

vattam vattam viriyattum
vaanam thottu valarattum(2)

kozhi siragil kunjai polave
boomi pandhu urugattum
ratham sindhaa nootraandu
putham puthithaai viriyattum.
